name: Advanced Redirect Thank You for Woocommerce
author: actpro

sections.description:
ğŸ‘‰ Boost sales & Increase conversion rates with WooCommerce Advance Redirect Thank You Page

ğŸ‘‰ Easily redirect your customers after checkout!

You can use any WordPress page of your choice and customize it as you prefer, so to give your own personal touch of style to the website and to fill a small gap in the purchasing process: saying thanks to them!

Create checkout experience customize to each customer with Show Product Recommendations, encourage social media sharing, Offer discount coupon codes for next purchase and
cross-sell recommendations. Using a custom redirect after checkout generates more opportunities to increase sales with existing customers.

This plugin can also be used to build a custom WooCommerce thank you the page without overriding template files!

Key features

ğŸ”‘ Easily redirect your customers after checkout!
ğŸ”‘ Enable or disable Redirection
ğŸ”‘ Order Details on Thank You page.
ğŸ”‘ Set Global custom Thank you page by custom URL’s
ğŸ”‘ Set a custom Thank you page per Product by Page
ğŸ”‘ Set a custom Thank you page per Payment method by Page
ğŸ”‘ If multiple redirects exist, the customer will be directed to the first one

ğŸ’ Why customize WooCommerce Thank You pages

ğŸ”‘ Build trust with your customers

  • Showcase Social Proof
  • Testimonials from Happy Customers
  • Positive Reviews and Feedback on Thank you page
  • Show Personal Connection by a short video
  • Share orders from Thank-you Page

ğŸ”‘ Offer Repeat Conversions

  • Show relevant promotional programs
  • Offer to customers coupons for the next purchase
  • Upsell other services on Thank you page
  • Enable newsletter subscription to strengthen the retention
  • show Product Recommendations To Encourage Them To Buy More

ğŸ”‘ Turn your customers into promoters

  • Encouraging social sharing of a recent order
  • Encourages buyers to follow your social media
  • Increase their lifetime value by staying in touch on social.

ğŸ’ Need even more features? upgrade the premium plugin version to get all the advanced features.

  • All Free plugin features
  • Pro – Set Multiple customs Thank you pages per Product by custom URL’s
  • Pro – Set a custom Thank you page per Payment Method by custom URL’s
  • Pro – Set Global custom Thank you page by custom URL’s
  • Pro – Set Global custom Failed to Thank you page by page
  • Pro – Set Global custom Failed to Thank you page by Failed Custom URL

ğŸ’ Plugin Use Cases

ğŸ’ Boosting your e-commerce store conversion rate by using the below list example:

  • Redirecting shop pick-up customers to a page with information about nearby shop pick-up address
  • Add a custom Thank You page for an upcoming product item with information on availability
  • Add a custom Thank You page with social share buttons for specific products
  • Add a custom Thank You page with customer Testimonials for specific products
  • Set a global Thank You page without editing theme templates
  • Provide next steps for paid members subscribing to video courses, online lessons, or coaching
  • Add a custom Thank You page with an offer to customers coupons for the next purchase
  • Add a custom Thank You page with an offer to Upsell other services onThank you page
  • Add a custom Thank You page with Enable newsletter subscriptionon Thank you page

ğŸ’ Contact Us

Free plugin: Need Technical Help? – Click here
